member.name: T:GoodAI.Modules.School.Common.SchoolCurriculum
member.summary: Holds tasks that an agent should be trained with to gain new abilities

member.name: T:GoodAI.Modules.School.Common.TrainingSetHints
member.summary: Training set hints are concrete parameters that determine the difficulty of a task, such as presence of noise or the number of attempts that the agent gets to complete the task. The values of the hints depend on the ChallengeLevel. Hints are world independent, and can sometimes be used/interpreted differently depending on the world.

member.name: T:GoodAI.Modules.School.LearningTasks.LTMovingTarget
member.author: GoodAI
member.description: Ability Name: Efficient navigation in a simple environment + moving target. In this Learning task there is an agent and a moving target, to pass each level the agent needs to reach the target a defined number of consecutive times, There is a limit on the number of timesteps that can be used to reach the target, If this limit is reached, the level fails and the agent starts from the same level but the number of consecutive times is reset. Different levels will create targets with different moving characteristics. The teacher declares the ability as learned when the agent reaches the last level.

member.name: T:GoodAI.Modules.School.LearningTasks.LTMovingTargetD
member.author: GoodAI
member.description: Ability Name: Efficient navigation in a simple environment + moving target. The class is derived from LTApproach with some additions for the moving target (currently: circular movement). Current behaviour of the target, the target moves itself towards the trajectory (the ellipse contained inside the rectangle (the screen)) and then it follows the trajectory
